titles.title: Servicemember Debt Collection Reform Act
A bill to ensure the compliance of Department of Defense regulations with Federal consumer protection laws on the collection of debt.
Servicemember Debt Collection Reform Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Servicemember Debt Collection Reform Act
This bill directs the Department of Defense (DOD) to review and update DOD Directive 1344.09 and any associated regulations to ensure that such regulations governing debt collector interactions with unit commanders of members of the Armed Forces comply with federal consumer protection laws with respect to debt collection.
